questions.question: This term refers to the deployment of artificial intelligence algorithms on edge devices, such as smartphones and IoT devices.
This type of edge AI device is commonly used in smart home applications to process data locally.
This term refers to the practice of processing data on edge devices rather than sending it to a centralized cloud server.
This technology allows edge AI devices to make real-time decisions based on sensor data.
This company is known for its edge AI platform called Jetson, which is used for deploying AI applications on edge devices.
